function.name: lookup_address
function.description: Verify a delivery street address exists in the restaurant's delivery zone. Call this BEFORE confirming a delivery order to ensure the address is valid. The tool uses phonetic matching to handle similar-sounding street names (like Golf vs Gulf).

zipCode.description: 5-digit ZIP code for the delivery address

streetName.description: Street name as spoken by customer (e.g., 'Golf Road', 'Main Street')

spelledStreetName.description: Only provide if customer spelled the street name letter by letter. Accepts 'G O L F' or 'G as in George, O, L, F' format.

attempt.description: Set to 1 for first attempt, 2 if customer already spelled the name and you're retrying
